abstract_summ: There is a striking correlation between the number of infected people of a certain week and the deaths of the following one . Authors say the lethality rate is virtually unchanged over the last two months . They say the high apparent lethality or case fatality ratio (CFR) observed in Italy is likely biased by a strong underestimation of infection cases . Authors: More than 50% of cases were undetected in most countries, with more than 90% undetected cases .
